reviewText: How disappointing - it was in French!  Really wanted it for my son (who speaks English).

I grew up with these comics, along with Tin tin, Asterix ...etc... and it brings back a lot of fond memories.  My sons are liking these just fine, although they are not their favorite.  It is worth it though.
awesome it in english and everybody should at least try to watch a funny animated foreign movie and you won't regret it
